subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Daniil Kvyat, 19, will race in Formula One next season after the Toro Rosso team named him as the surprise replacement for the departing Daniel Ricciardo.
snippet: Daniil Kvyat, 19, will race in Formula One next season after the Toro Rosso team named him as the surprise replacement for the departing Daniel Ricciardo.
